breathless.gen.name: Name
breathless.dialogs.delete.title: Delete Item
breathless.dialogs.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
breathless.interface.warning.maxstorage: You can't add anything else to your

enable_storage.name: Enable Storage
enable_storage.hint: Enables use of storage item like a backpack / war bag

enable_healing.name: Enable Healing
enable_healing.hint: Characters can use healing item (e.g. medkit, healing spell, etc.)

enable_lootcheck.name: Enable Loot Check
enable_lootcheck.hint: Show loot check button on character sheet

cs_title.name: Character Sheet Title
cs_title.hint: Custom title for the character sheet

skill_name.name: Skills Custom Name
skill_name.hint: Set the displayed name for skills in your game (e.g. abilities, talents, etc.)

storage_name.name: Storage Custom Name
storage_name.hint: Custom name for storage - e.g. backpack, bag, kit, etc.

storage_max.name: Max Storage Capacity
storage_max.hint: How many kit or storage items can a character hold?

healing_name.name: Healing Custom Name
healing_name.hint: Set the displayed name for Healing in your game (e.g. medkit, spell, bandage, etc.)

stress_name.name: Stress Custom Name
stress_name.hint: Custom name for Stress in your game

special_name.name: Special Ability Custom Name
special_name.hint: Name for special ability - e.g. Stunt, Truth, etc.

special_unrolled.name: Special Ability Unrolled
special_unrolled.hint: Check this if the character's special ability does NOT trigger a dice roll
